content.rendered:
I was lucky to be able to spend a month in Australia in April/May, working on a couple of projects, including this one with the child protection charity NAPCAN.

The Aboriginal Girls Circle is an education project that brings Aboriginal girls together to connect with each other, explore their identity, have fun, and work together to make positive changes in their community.
